Oregon.description: A training facility with tight angles and vertical play.

strategies: Take Master Balcony control and open Attic wall.
Pinch site from Big Window and Trophy.

operators.name: Ace
operators.task: Open Attic wall from Master Balcony with Selma charges.

operators.name: Zofia
operators.task: Clear Trophy shields and barbed wire from White Stairs.

operators.name: Sledge
operators.task: Use sledgehammer from Kitchen to disrupt roamers and pressure Trophy.

operators.name: Nomad
operators.task: Place Airjabs on White Stairs and Lobby flank routes.

operators.name: Iana
operators.task: Use Gemini Replicator to bait out utility and entry frag Big Window.

strategies: Hold Attic and Trophy with utility and crossfires.
Deny plant from Big Window and Master with C4 and smokes.

operators.name: Smoke
operators.task: Hold close angles and deny plant with smoke canisters.

operators.name: Mute
operators.task: Jam entry points like Trophy and Attic doors to deny drone intel.

operators.name: Wamai
operators.task: Place discs near shields in Attic and Trophy to catch grenades.

operators.name: Jäger
operators.task: Cover Big Window and Master with ADS devices to protect anchors.

operators.name: Aruni
operators.task: Reinforce and place gates on Attic and Master to slow attackers.
